title: Three Inhibs down, our team has Baron what happens next..
body:
All three of our inhibs are down, lategame, we have baron, one fight will make or break the game. Just bought my Merc Scimitar ready for the last fight but then my computer suddenly starts lagging, League randomly closes, Skype is still on but all other apps are being force closed..........
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
"Please wait while we configure windows updates lel, we didn't notify you at all, nor is it set to automatic, but enjoy the force restart kid"
FUCK YOU WINDOWS UPDATE.
This was ranked, God Bless.
